entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
